course_description: The goal of this course is for students to begin mastering the skills that will allow students to ask appropriate clinical questions, access the medical literature, assess the validity and results of individual studies as well as summarize the literature, and determine the applicability of the available medical literature to a particular patient problem.
sections: Class Nbr: 1037, Section #: 2020, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: D. Schulman, Status: Open
